name: Smog & Cogs
description:
Diesel Punk 1/2 player turn based strategy, made in 8 weeks by 9 students (four programmers, three artists, two designers) at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment, Canberra.

Artists:
Daniel Evans: https://danielevanscharact.wixsite.com/mysite
Isaac Bathani: https://isaacbathani.artstation.com/
Ned Keys: ned_keys.artstation.com

Designers: 
Michael Tate: https://www.michaeltategame.com/
Daniel Edwards: danieledwards25.wixsite.com/portfolio

Programmers:
David Passlow: https://davidpasslow-programmer.carrd.co/#
Callum: https://callumdunstone.wixsite.com/website
